summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1925, for the improvement of Thackery Place, in the City of Seattle, from a connection with the existing sewer at East Forty-second Street and Latona Avenue, to East Fiftieth Street, by constructing a sewer therein of proper dimensions and material, together with all necessary wyes, opening, manholes, catch basins and other appurtenances, under Ordinance No. 19843, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
